### Blog Posts

#### Ralph - Autonomous Loop for Claude Code
- URL: /posts/ralph-claude-code.html
- Published: 2026-01-01
- Description: Ralph is a bash wrapper exclusively for Claude Code that creates a continuous development loop. Define your project in PROMPT.md, let Claude iteratively build until completion. Covers loop concepts, exit detection, tmux integration, and CLI usage.

#### SpecKit - Specification-Driven Development
- URL: /posts/speckit-specification-driven-development.html
- Published: 2025-12-27
- Description: An open-source toolkit that transforms development by making specifications executable. Covers the SpecKit workflow (init, specify, plan, implement), use cases for greenfield projects and rapid prototyping, and comparison with BMAD Method.

#### How AI Agents Use Markdown Files
- URL: /posts/ai-agents-markdown.html
- Published: 2025-12-27
- Description: Comprehensive guide on why AI coding assistants rely on markdown files for project-specific instructions. Covers token efficiency, naming conventions by tool (Cursor, Claude, OpenAI Codex, GitHub Copilot, Windsurf), and file hierarchy inheritance.

#### BMAD Method - AI Development Framework
- URL: /posts/bmad-infographic.html
- Published: 2025-12-27
- Description: BMAD (Breakthrough Method for Agile AI-Driven Development) framework infographic. Covers two core phases (Agentic Planning and Context-Engineered Development), specialized AI agent roles (Analyst, PM, Architect, UX, Scrum Master, Developer, QA, Product Owner), and development workflow.
